title: Only You
resume: Only You is a Korean television series produced and broadcast by SBS in early 2005. It is the only Korean drama shot in Italy. The city in which has been shot the drama in Italy is Vicenza which is located in the north East part, between Venice and Verona. It features Jo Hyun-jae and Han Chae-young as the main protagonists. It was first aired in South Korea starting 4 June 2005.
